column5: Took the ice shack off over a week ago, then it got cold and the ice road was more navigable again, went back for another try at some fish after school with my boy. Ice out can wait! Just kidding, can't wait till I can get in the boat 6 weeks is my guess and i'll be slam min walleye and lakers in the same spot!ICE ROAD VIDEOhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KnHM1zKcHlY
Thoroughly enjoyed that one! Nice production! I'm jealous. Not too many walleye holes in Phoenix AZ but at least I will be back on Lac Seul again come June! Thanks for sharing!

Thanks man, took a while to put that one together ..lol so many clips to sort through! Got another hour in tonight, got a couple of keepers at last, had to wade through about 15 tiny ones first though, will post the vid once I've stuck it all together.
For sure, it takes hours of video, editing and patience to put together a few minute clip.
